body: Explore This Park    Plan Your Visit     Directions & Transportation     Getting Around              Getting Around       Public Transportation  Commuter rail service is available from Boston's North Station to Lowell's Gallagher Terminal. Lowell Regional Transit Authority shuttles run between Gallagher Terminal and downtown Lowell every half hour. Monday through Friday, 6:00 a.m. to 6:00 p.m.; Saturday 10:00 a.m. to 4:00 p.m. Please check the following web sites for the most current information available.
